response:
There are two versions of Spirits you can use.

Strange's version - Where both light and dark spirits also have the neutral element.
Darkermoon's version - All 3 spirits elements are separate, with a new WIP 'primal' element.

Click the buttons bellow for a link. Both of these plugins go in the `/plugins/` folder. Take note that the [Spirits Complete Set] addon comes with Darkmoon's version, but has to be installed in `/plugins/ProjectKorra/Abilities/` for Strange's version (in ADDITION to the plugin).
